main event: A report describing a glowing object or phenomenon in the night sky observed in Newark, Ohio on October 16, 1958.
interesting points: The object appears bright and circular in shape., The object is surrounded by a hazy or glowing aura., The photograph focuses on the glowing orb against a dark, starry night sky., The object is described as oblong-shaped in a black and white photograph., There are no identifiable individuals present in the images.
witness description: No witnesses are mentioned in the report.
